content.raw: But what if the noise type is being specified in an sdf string? It seems like a hassle to have to specify it in the constructor in that case. Whoever wants to create the noise object would have to preemptively parse the sdf to identify the correct NoiseType to pass in the constructor.
content.html: But what if the noise type is being specified in an sdf string? It seems like a hassle to have to specify it in the constructor in that case. Whoever wants to create the noise object would have to preemptively parse the sdf to identify the correct NoiseType to pass in the constructor.
